storyInfo: When W comes to, the mercenaries have already transferred to the former Rhodes Island. While Hoederer participates in a meeting, W is carefully investigating her new surroundings when she meets her King.

attributes.content: The Sarkaz stopped.
The burning ruins collapsed in towards the center. Those monstrous creatures looked down on us from above.
A woman suddenly emerged from the center of the circle. A very... strange woman.
She wasn't Sarkaz. She stood in the center of the battlefield, her expression unchanging.
Ines was trembling, but I couldn't tell you why.
The explosion must have damaged my hearing. I couldn't hear what they were saying.
But I knew they were afraid.
Was it because of her?
No, their attention was focused in another direction, on someone else.
In the seconds before I lost consciousness, I saw——
A... Sarkaz.
An unthreatening... slender Sarkaz.
They... for the moment...
Sarkaz... must...
...You will... what?
She is heavily injured... If we don't do something now...
...If... he... finds this place... We're out of time...
...Kal'tsit, give me a hand.
...*Sigh*. Fine.
Where am I...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: On a landship.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Landship...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How are we still alive?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you're gonna screw around, can you leave me out of it?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Long story short, we got rescued.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: So where are we?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The main convoy. This is the landship we were protecting. Now it's hauling our wounded.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Looks like it's still under construction. I can't tell how it all fits together. Weird.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (But the shadow I saw... It was... Some questions are better left unanswered.)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What about Hoederer?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He's with the client... Err, he's... talking to the boss of this place.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Right. If you're still hanging around here, Hoederer must be fine.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: So what's the deal with 'the boss of this place?'
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You look nervous. And I don't need to blind myself with Originium Arts to figure that out.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't tell me you think I'm hanging out here because I care about you?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Definitely not. So what's the reason?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *Sigh.*
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I guess I just feel bad for him.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Who knows what kinds of monsters are in that room with him...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Try to relax. Nervousness will only drag down our efficiency.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You did the best you could. The leak was our fault.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We don't really look for fault on the battlefield. I know who I'm dealing with.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I can't say I expected that commander... to be one of Her Majesty's own.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're... a lot stronger than I expected. I haven't had a chance to thank you yet, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Theresa's the one you should be thanking.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What was that about me?
Your Majesty——
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're not in Kazdel anymore. Let's not stand on ceremony. We're here to sit down and talk, Hoederer.
By your command.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And, the one in the coat there must be...?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I hope you don't mind. It's very important that the Doctor be well aware of any new intelligence.
Thank you for understanding.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: (It really is a landship... But it's pretty big, huh...?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (There are parts that look new, but some bits are so old they're practically falling apart...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (I think... this is from Rim Billiton...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh! S-sorry. They're still building this place...
attributes.name: Small Cautus

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit said... not to go any deeper. It's dangerous...
attributes.name: Small Cautus

attributes.content: Uh huh...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Okay. I'll go somewhere else.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Small Cautus

attributes.content: What a nice kid. With those ears, she's definitely not Sarkaz.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Come to think of it, that one lady who sucks even more than Ines, that doctor, she isn't a Sarkaz either...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's going on here? I look around in the middle of a battle and nobody's Sarkaz?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How could you be jammed again?!
Huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Happy place, Closure. That's only the seventh short circuit today...
THE——SEVENTH——SHORT——CIRCUIT——
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kind of embarrassing for a genius engineer, huh? What if we invested in a new set of doors? That'd save some time!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh... well, we have so many wounded to care for. Their provisions are rather expensive, in both manpower and resources...
And wouldn't giving up be an even bigger embarrassment...?
Waaaahhhh——
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Okay! Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Give me three days! If I can't fix it in three days, I'll take the whole security control system apart and reinstall it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Re-reinstall? You can do that?
I dunno who built these mysterious systems and then buried them out in Rim Billiton somewhere, then if we can't figure it out...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We'll just have to replace it with something we can! Easy peasy!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Well... I'll leave you to it then.
Roger that!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
Rhodes Island... how long will it be until you're up and running...?
Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh...
You're... I remember, you were with Hoederer...
You've regained consciousness? Your wounds were quite serious.
(Did I scare her...?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm W, the mercenary. I'm looking for Captain Hoederer and I kinda got lost...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Be careful where you wander. This place is still being built. There are a lot of exposed wires. You could get shocked.
But I have a feeling such caution is second nature to you, no?
W, was it?
You may call me Theresa.
Hoederer had words with the Doctor after our meeting. I believe he should be back in his room in Medical by now.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Don't make them worry. You ought to head back too.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa... Your Majesty?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh? Well, we're not in Kazdel anymore. No need for titles.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Okay, Theresa... Majesty, why were you wrestling with a door just now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And that short girl there is an engineer, right? I mean, it's just a door...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's not just a door.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: O... kay?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How many things are there totally unworthy of my attention?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So what's Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, you heard that.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That is the name of this vessel. Although it has not yet been officially christened... that is the name I wish for it.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Maybe it's just my whimsy. The Doctor and Kal'tsit may reject its 'true name.'
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: ...Heh. True name? For this landship?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You saw. This vessel wasn't built in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Searching deep in the oldest records we have, I came across that name...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 'Rhodes Island.'
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I'm not actually sure what it means. Hm... Kal'tsit should know more.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But that is what I want to name it. It already had a name, after all.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: (Her Majesty Theresa fought against the Regent who usurped Kazdel... She personally brought together more than half the Sarkaz clans...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (...and she's fixing a door herself?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's wrong? You have an odd expression on your face.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Would it be considered improper to laugh in front of Your Majesty?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: N-no... But neither Kal'tsit nor the Doctor are the laughing type... and the warriors have too much on their plates for such frivolity.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I would quite like it if you all would smile.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But that is perhaps an extravagant hope. I understand the pressure I've placed on everyone.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So I'm cool to laugh then?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Um, yes?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Nah, the magic's gone. Can't do it...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Why do I feel like that's my fault?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Hehe... well, I wouldn't dare.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What about me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I am Theresa, this is Rhodes Island, and you are?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That's not what I mean. 'W' is a mercenary codename. I want to know your true name. The one that represents you..
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You need not cloak yourself in a disguise tainted by war. This goes beyond names. Let's just say I'm nosy.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Oh... forgive me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You don't have a name?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It's pretty common for Sarkaz born in Kazdel.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We don't really care much for... names. People forget them all the time. What's the point in making an effort to remember a name?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't want to forget them. I can't forget them.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: If you wait for the dust to settle in Kazdel... until you're no longer 'W,' we could speak like this once again.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Maybe then you could have a more fitting name. A proper name for a Sarkaz woman like yourself.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Like Rhodes Island. A name makes things feel so much warmer, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I never really thought about it...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Theresa, message.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kazdel is on the move. The Doctor is getting ready.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right, I'm on my way.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: W?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, I'm here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you are willing to fight for us still, you will always be welcome here. No matter what.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm not going to criticize Theresa's decision, but...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't expect too warm a welcome. I've seen your record. You're dangerous.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh. Same?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're recovering fast, but not enough to have you wandering around as you please.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Go back to bed before we have to have someone carry you there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I realized later.
I never dared to look Theresa in the eye.
Why?
She looked so naive.
It wasn't the look of a leader at the head of one of the armies in our cruel war...
Is naive the word...?
You don't have eyes like that when you're naive... Such... sad eyes.
And those two were always at her side, it seemed.
If... if I could stand with them...
What kind of sights would I see?
(That hood... is that the 'Doctor' they were talking about?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Is that person... looking my way...?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (What the... Why...?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Am I scared? Scared of what? That person gives off pretty normal vibes, but...? No, it's too vague. I've never seen anyone that weird before...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Oh... that's Babel's battlefield commander. I remember now...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ('The Doctor,' huh?)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm starting to get why Ines wouldn't go near Her Majesty.
Maybe it would be better to look out for myself every once in a while.
But... I'm not sure why... Ugh, when it comes to Theresa, I never really knew why...
Call it a whim. Hoederer and the others would understand.
